text: “nætahot sæbævin ma ibrahim, ismail, ishak, yahkub ha asbat (hevat ovun ge parapura) yudevvan lesin ho kitunuvan lesin siti bava numbala pavasannehu da? mænavin danna numbala da nætahot allah dæ” yi (nabivaraya!) asanu. ohu abiyasa vu allah ge sadhakayak vasan karannan ta vada maha aparadhakaruva kavarek da? tava da numbala karamin sitina dæ pilibanda va allah nosælakili mat keneku nove
